titleStmt.title: Description of University of Pennsylvania CAJS Rar Ms 64: Mikhtav baḳashah le-maʻanaḳ li-nesiʻa.

notesStmt.note: A letter containing an appeal by Yosef ben Yeshuʻa Naṭaf, to grant him money for passage from New York to France, since he is ill and is anxious to join his parents in Europe.

msIdentifier.repository: Library at the Herbert D. Katz Center for Advanced Judaic Studies

msItem.title: Mikhtav baḳashah le-maʻanaḳ li-nesiʻa.
מכתב בקשה למענק לנסיעה מניו יורק לצרפת
